page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ME
page.content: At 6:45 I get up and go downstairs for my breakfast. My sister gets up 5 or 10 minutes after me, so I try to eat my breakfast fast so that I don't have to sit with her. After breakfast I get dressed ready for School. At 8 oclock me, my sister and my mother set off for Middleton Cheney. I don't go straight to School, I go to Chris Adkin's house. This is so that I can walk to School with him. School starts at 9 oclock; we all line up, then class by class we go in. We hang up our coats on the trolly and then walk into class. Our teacher, Mr Allen, tells us to be quiet. Mr Allen then calls the register. This is followed by assembly. After assembly we study Maths, this is boring. I'm in the first Maths Group. We usually have a mental arithmetic test; I usually get 6 r 7 out of 10, rarely 10/10. After Maths is Playtime. (Cont: page 8).
